controller.musicplayer

Class LoopableMusicPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.UpdatableObserversManager
      • controller.AbstractBasicPlayer
        • controller.musicplayer.AbstractMusicPlayer
          • controller.musicplayer.ClassicMusicPlayer
            • controller.musicplayer.LoopableMusicPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loopable, MusicPlayer, PlaylistFeatureCommand, Observable, Player

    public class LoopableMusicPlayer
extends ClassicMusicPlayer
implements Loopable
    An extension of the class ClassicMusicPlayer that add the management of the Loop mode This class implement the interface Loopable
    Author:
    Matteo Gabellini
